pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/dragoon/django-selenium.png :target: https://travis-ci.org/dragoon/django-selenium=====================================Django Selenium Integration Library=====================================What is it?===========| **Django-selenium** is a library that provides seamless integration for Django_ framework with a Selenium_ testing tool. Additionally it provides syntactic sugar for writing and maintaining selenium tests.Documentation is available at: https://django-selenium.readthedocs.org/.. _Django: http://www.djangoproject.com/.. _Selenium: http://seleniumhq.org/
